creditline: Gift of Fred Hagstrom and Sandra Spadaccini
description: multicolored ground--red and orange at top and bottom--blue, green, tan, purple at center; horizontal stripe at top with "the Dream" in black; central image with portrait with sitter's hands on upper chest; bottom stripe with "And lie" in black
provenance: Fred Hagstrom, St. Paul; given to MIA, 2019.
signed: LRC in white pencil: Hagstrom / Dream & Lie
title: The Dream and Lie
